question: Question
checkResults: Now you can check the answers and questions again of the deck
challengeOthers: Here you can challenge yourself and other players in quiz games.
includesFunctionality: Flashcard now also includes functionality that lets you create your own decks of flashcards.
startByInviting: Start by inviting a player and joining the lobby.
suggestAndVote: Suggest and vote on a deck to play with your fellow players.
whenEveryoneReady: when Everyone is ready the asnwer will be shown for a few seconds and then you will go to the next question.
